It looks like this app is restricted from running in the background. Please, enable running in the background to make sure, that widgets and notification would run smoothly.
Open the App info page, go to the Battery section and disable background battery restrictions. Don\'t be afraid of a battery drain, this app is well optimized to save as much as possible.
If the problem persist, try opening Settings > Battery or Settings > Device care > Battery. Search for the Battery manager or the Background usage limits and remove this app from sleep.
